name: Santa's Killing Tonight Tonight
description:
You play as Jim. Jim has been on the naughty list one too many times for being too normal, and Santa is sick of it. Santa has kidnapped Jim and taken him to a gated off place somewhere. Now Jim must find all 6 keys to escape the gated area while trying to avoid the magical teleporting Santa that now wants to kill him for being too normal.

Features:
-Teleporting Santa that says "Hello" every three seconds
-Keys that will be randomly placed every time you play the game
-Jim

Santa's Killing is a small game that I made over a week. This is nothing too special, just a game I wanted to make for the Christmas Season. I hope everyone enjoys what is a very dumb yet somewhat enjoyable game.

Average play time: ~5-10 Minutes
